question: Who introduces Solid Waste Management vehicles to maintain cleanliness?
explanation: Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister N Chandrababu Naidu flagged off thirty Solid Waste Management vehicles, a unique initiative of the state government in order to achieve the goal of Swach Andhra. He stated that the state government has set up new greenery and landscaping corporation for the clean and transparent environment. The government will use new machines to clean street lights and pruning trees.
